summary: Implement release parser for raw CSV input

summaries.executive-style: We are developing a new feature to streamline data processing - a release parser for raw CSV input. This will allow our system to effectively interpret and manage data in CSV format, leading to more efficient data handling and improved system performance.
We are focused on implementing an expedited product update cycle to ensure our offerings remain competitive and current in the market.

summary: Refactor release module to support multi-source inputs

summaries.executive-style: We've upgraded the release module to accommodate inputs from multiple sources, enhancing its versatility and functionality.
